about_the_game:
For the first time anywhere, the piano arrangement album of Harmonia is now available digitally!
With 11 tracks in both FLAC and MP3 formats, download the Harmonia Piano Arrange Album, "teneritas", now and enjoy the beautiful piano renditions of your favorite Harmonia music.

* This soundtrack DLC is a digital version of the original 2017 album Harmonia Piano Arrange Album "teneritas" (KLSA-0135) from the game's Japanese limited edition release and features 11 tracks.

Harmonia Piano Arrange Album "teneritas" Track list

1. Kotoba (from Todoketai Melody)

2. Sekai (from Terrarum)
3. Itonami (from Vitae)
4. Utaumono (from Cantus)
5. Ikoi (from Oppidum)
6. Kiroku (from Library)
7. Tsumeato (from Rruinis)
8. Tsumi (from Pecado)
9. Kanashimi (from Tristitia)
10. Ayumi (from Harmonia)
11. Towa (from Towa no Hoshi e)
